title: What a whirlwind relationship!
creator_credit: Lucy Pucci, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Two months into their relationship, Lucy Pucci told her partner that she has Turner’s Syndrome and won’t be able to have children. He stuck by her then, just as he has stuck by her through their various agonising attempts to have children of their own.
creator_credit_for_label: Lucy Pucci, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
description: Two months into their relationship, Lucy Pucci told her partner that she has Turner’s Syndrome and won’t be able to have children. He stuck by her then, just as he has stuck by her through their various agonising attempts to have children of their own.
